subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. said on Tuesday that the move would “provide an opportunity for a new C.E.O. to begin on a clean slate and for the team to stabilize under difficult circumstances.”
snippet: The N.B.A. said on Tuesday that the move would “provide an opportunity for a new C.E.O. to begin on a clean slate and for the team to stabilize under difficult circumstances.”
